description:
After a loyal horse and his recently-returned master are assaulted by thugs, Luffy is drawn into a Davy Back Fight with the Foxy Pirates. The Straw Hat captain never backs down from a challenge, but this contest could cost him his crew!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Davy Back with the Foxy Pirates!
Foxy Kaizoku Dan to Davy Back!
L`équipage de Foxy le pirate et le Davy Back Fight !
قتال ديفي باك مع قراصنة فوكسي
กลุ่มโจรสลักฟ็อกซี่กับเดวี่แบ็ค
フォクシー海賊団とデービーバック!
